metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7282 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In NetKit through 0.17, rcp.c in the rcp client allows remote rsh servers to bypass intended access restrictions via the filename of . or an empty filename. The impact is modifying the permissions of the target directory on the client side. This is similar to CVE-2018-20685.

criterions.comment: netkit-rsh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
